hudson.tasks.Shell.command: virtualenv mfserver2_venv source mfserver2_venv/bin/activate pip install fabric fab create_do_box_and_wait:"$DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN","/home/jenkins/.ssh/id_rsa.pub","jenkins_key"
cd provisioning/terraform/do echo MFSERVER2_IP=`terraform output ip` > mfserver2.properties

scp -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/mcjug_backup/aabuddy_mfserver2_schema.dump root@$MFSERVER2_IP:. scp /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/mcjug_backup/aabuddy_mfserver2_data.dump root@$MFSERVER2_IP:. ssh -t root@$MFSERVER2_IP "cp /root/aabuddy_mfserver2_schema.dump /opt/mfserver2/code/" ssh -t root@$MFSERVER2_IP "chown reg_user:reg_user /opt/mfserver2/code/aabuddy_mfserver2_schema.dump" ssh -t root@$MFSERVER2_IP "cp /root/aabuddy_mfserver2_data.dump /opt/mfserver2/code/" ssh -t root@$MFSERVER2_IP "chown reg_user:reg_user /opt/mfserver2/code/aabuddy_mfserver2_data.dump"

ssh -t root@$MFSERVER2_IP 'sudo -i -u reg_user bash -c "cd /opt/mfserver2/code/; source /opt/mfserver2/venv/bin/activate; fab -fdjango_app/old_db_restore/fab_restore.py restore:/opt/mfserver2/code/aabuddy_mfserver2_schema.dump,/opt/mfserver2/code/aabuddy_mfserver2_data.dump"' ssh -t root@$MFSERVER2_IP "sudo -i -u postgres bash -c 'vacuumdb mfserver2'" ssh -t root@$MFSERVER2_IP "systemctl stop postgresql-9.6" ssh -t root@$MFSERVER2_IP "systemctl start postgresql-9.6" deactivate
